subject_description: A lonely man sitting inside a small glass guard booth at night, illuminated by the cold blue light of surveillance monitors, a thermos of coffee on the desk.
A person standing at a street corner holding hands with two other people who are pulling in slightly different directions, a rainbow flag visible in the background.
A judge's gavel striking a table, next to it a baby pacifier and a stack of money bills, symbolizing legal obligation and family.
A computer screen displaying the word "APROVADO" in green letters, a person in front of it raising arms in relief, shackles falling off their wrists.
Hands peeling a large amount of potatoes and carrots on a stainless steel table, showing the labor behind the food, warm lighting.
A work uniform hanging on a hook, abandoned, while a suitcase stands packed and ready by the door, symbolizing freedom from labor.
A luxury car parked across two parking spots (including a disabled spot), a man in a suit walking away without looking back, symbolizing entitlement.

A shirtless man standing in a messy workshop, holding a roll of black electrical tape high in one hand and a screwdriver in the other, wires hanging from the ceiling, an improvised fan made of plastic bottles on the table.
A chaotic living room scene during Christmas dinner, a table overturned, food spilling, two relatives shouting at each other, a plastic chair flying through the air.
A hand inserting a credit card into a machine, red sparks flying out of the slot, symbolizing dangerous debt.
Hands carefully packing food into a plastic container (marmita), steam rising in the shape of a heart, kitchen table setting with a checkered tablecloth.
A figure applying makeup in a small mirror while sitting on a curb, neon lights from clubs reflecting in puddles on the asphalt, hopeful expression.
Reflection in a car's rearview mirror showing two figures on a motorcycle right behind, evoking fear and paranoia.
A man standing in a hallway holding a clipboard and pen like weapons, inspecting a tiny stain on the floor with exaggerated scrutiny, apartment doors in the background.
A large metal turnstile (catraca) in a bus or subway station, crowds of people waiting to pass through, a validator machine glowing red.
A smiling man wearing shorts and flip-flops standing behind a smoking brick barbecue grill, holding a skewer of meat in one hand and a beer in the other, pouring beer perfectly into a glass.
A group of people walking like zombies, eyes fixed on their glowing phone screens, walking towards a cliff edge, fog obscuring the path.
A passenger sleeping with head against the bus window, mouth slightly open, reflection of city lights on the glass, heavy traffic jam background.
Close-up of a caramel dog sitting in front of a bakery glass window, staring with spiritual longing at a rotating machine full of roasted chickens, golden light reflecting on his face.
A crowded beach scene under a blazing yellow sun, colorful umbrellas, people of all body types in swimwear, a child playing in the sand, ocean waves in background.
A dignified black woman wearing traditional white lace Bahian dress and turban, sitting on a wooden chair, throwing cowrie shells (b√∫zios) onto a table, herbs and clay pots in the background.
A motorcycle courier speeding through a narrow corridor between cars in a traffic jam, wearing a yellow raincoat and a square thermal backpack, rain falling, dynamic motion.
A chaotic scene of people throwing stones and garbage at each other, shouting, representing polarization and hatred.
A person holding a phone up to the sky in an empty field or street, desperate for connection, isolated.
A person bound and blindfolded, surrounded by floating telephone receivers and headsets, trapped in a loop.
A person sitting up in bed at night, hands covering face, giant paper bills (boletos) with barcodes hanging on the wall behind like swords.
A woman sitting behind a glass counter, holding a giant rubber stamp, stern face, piles of documents around her, one hand extended saying "stop".
View through a rainy windshield of red taillights ahead, grey sky, melancholy atmosphere of travel.
A brown envelope marked "URGENTE" lying on a doormat, pierced by a letter opener (or knife) representing a threat, ominous shadow.
Two people sitting back to back in a room, arms crossed, a giant wall of ice separating them, phones in hand.
A smartphone screen displaying a compromising photo or chat, cracked glass, rain falling on it, symbolizing heartbreak.
A hand accepting money under a table, while the other hand stamps "APPROVED", symbolizing corruption and authority.
A pair of binoculars spying on a happy couple from a distance, representing envy and surveillance.
A dark living room illuminated only by a TV screen showing a soccer game, a cable running in through the window from the street.
A lone person standing in a spotlight covering their face while the audience throws "thumbs down" signs and tomatoes.
A fox dressed in a suit shaking hands with a wolf, representing legal agility and moral flexibility.
Many hands coming together to build a small brick house, symbolizing community effort and solidarity.
A man standing on top of a pile of money, looking at a smartwatch, indifferent to the city below him.
A hand coming out of a cloud holding a large golden coin that looks like a Christmas bonus check, a lush garden below, feeling of temporary wealth.
A beautiful private garden with a high wall separating it from a crowded city, a woman enjoying the peace oblivious to the outside.
A mason laying bricks in a living room, dust everywhere, a couple looking at a blueprint, three coins embedded in the wall.
A locked safe with cobwebs on it, symbolizing stagnant wealth and refusal to spend.
A man lying in a hammock, wearing flip-flops and shorts, holding a beer can in one hand and juggling a coin in the other, lazy expression.
A child offering a sweet to a driver inside a car, the contrast between the hot street and the air-conditioned interior.
A hand crossing fingers tightly while watching a TV screen showing numbered lottery balls being drawn.
A person walking past a brightly lit shopping mall window, looking inside with longing, but blocked by a glass wall, wearing worn-out clothes.
A delivery person handing a paper bag to a hand reaching out from a gate, the transaction of service.
Hands counting small change and crumpled bills, the result of a hard day's work, simple table.
A strong foundation of a house with roots growing deep into the earth, symbolizing stability and legacy.
Close up of manicured hands with many gold rings holding a glass of champagne, shallow luxury.
Close up of a sturdy pair of hands fixing a complex machine or organizing cables, symbolizing pragmatic leadership.
A lightbulb that has exploded and is smoking, grey and dreary background, piles of paperwork untouched.
A car waiting at a curb with hazard lights on, a passenger running towards it in the rain.
People struggling to enter a train door that is closing, bodies squeezed, a backpack caught in the door.
Close up of a man with an intense fake smile and overly white teeth, pointing directly at the viewer, selling an illusion.
A person walking proudly through an office holding a new ID badge up high, colleagues clapping with fake smiles in the background.
A youth showing a smartphone screen to an older boss, pointing at a TikTok trend, representing new ideas.
A group of people sitting in a circle, lightbulbs glowing above their heads, connecting lines drawn between them.
A hand holding a large rubber stamp coming out of a cloud, hovering over a messy desk with a laptop, a coffee mug, and papers.
A clock spinning wildly fast, a calendar flipping pages rapidly, symbolizing the anxiety of modern communication.
An employee laughing nervously at a boss's joke, holding a drink, subtle tension in the eyes, neon bar sign background.
A split screen effect showing one person doing two different jobs: designing on a computer and baking cakes, symbolizing multiple incomes.
A hand slamming a car horn aggressively, veins popping out, view through the windshield of a chaotic street.
A security guard watching fireworks on a small TV screen in a reception booth, while the city skyline explodes with light outside the window.
Two people standing apart, staring into each other's eyes, but holding smartphones that are connected by a glowing pink beam of light or heart symbol.
A close up of a face singing passionately with eyes closed and tears streaming down, microphone in hand.
A framed family photo on a shelf, but the glass is cracked, hinting at dysfunction behind the perfection.
A calendar floating in the air with every day marked with a question mark, a confused person looking at it.
A woman sitting in a comfortable armchair, holding a small dog dressed in a sweater, gazing at it with intense motherly love, apartment setting.
A group of friends dancing and laughing on a rooftop (laje), holding beer cans, a barbecue grill smoking in the corner, favela skyline background.
A young man judging someone else's outfit with a side-eye look, standing in a trendy bar.
A fan sitting in a stadium seat, arms crossed, smiling smugly, wearing a team jersey, a trophy visible in the background.
A person lying in bed holding their head in pain, wearing sunglasses indoors, staring at a phone screen with regret, empty bottles on the floor.
A man singing into a microphone, one hand on his chest, winking at the audience, exuding confidence and emotion.
An empty chair at a restaurant table set for two, a candle burning down, silence.
Two children wearing funny costumes (rabbit, superhero) playing in a garden, vintage color palette, innocence.
A toast view, many hands holding different glasses clinking together in the center, beer spilling slightly, celebration.
A man sitting on a sofa explaining something to a woman who looks bored, mansplaining posture, vinyl records in background.
